sentence.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development1, an important member of the Kank gene family, plays an important role in the development of many malignant tumors.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: As a brand new tumor-suppressor gene, the expression of negative regulation of neuron projection development1 gene has been revealed to be downregulated or absent in many malignant tumors.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: Concurrently, in vivo establishment of mitotic spindle orientation mice experiments also confirmed that upregulation of negative regulation of neuron projection development1 expression led to reduced tumor formation in nude mice and significantly reduced tumor volume.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: These results revealed that upregulation of the negative regulation of neuron projection developmentl gene inhibited the progression of lung cancer both in vitro and in vivo, and its mechanism was closely related to cell apoptosis as well as tumor invasion and metastasis

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development
